table.name: gtm_dt_attribute_def
table.description: This table is a master table holds the information about  attributes and its type, the java class that implement the copy logic.

columns.name: GTM_DT_ATTRIBUTE_DEF_GID
columns.description: gtm_dt_attribute_def_gid contains unique identifier for data transfer attribute

columns.name: GTM_DT_ATTRIBUTE_DEF_XID
columns.description: gtm_dt_attribute_def_xid contains unique identifier for data transfer attribute

columns.name: ASSOCIATE_TRANSLATION_KEY
columns.description: This field stores string that defines the association type. Ex Trade Transaction or Trade Transcation Line.

columns.name: ATTRIBUTE_TRANSLATION_KEY
columns.description: This field stores string that defines the qualifier name. ex :Remark or Refnum

columns.name: SOURCE_LIST_TYPE1
columns.description: This field indicates the type of the qualifier for source attribute value. The values can be G/D/P/F. G in case the attribute is a simple attribute. D is used for drop list. P is used for picklist.F is used for Fixed List.

columns.name: SOURCE_QUERY_CLASS1
columns.description: This filed indicates the query class name of the source qualifier. This is required in case the value of the field source_list_type is G or P

columns.name: SOURCE_LIST_TYPE2
columns.description: This field indicates the type of the qualifier for source attribute value. The values can be G/D/P/F. G in case the attribute is a simple attribute. D is used for drop list. P is used for picklist.F is used for Fixed List.

columns.name: SOURCE_QUERY_CLASS2
columns.description: This filed indicates the query class name of the source qualifier. This is required in case the value of the field source_list_type is G or P

columns.name: TARGET_LIST_TYPE1
columns.description: This field indicates the type of the qualifier for target attribute value. The values can be G/D/P/F. G in case the attribute is a simple attribute. D is used for drop list. P is used for picklist.F is used for Fixed List.

columns.name: TARGET_QUERY_CLASS1
columns.description: This filed indicates the query class name of the target qualifier. This is required in case the value of the field target_list_type is G or P

columns.name: TARGET_LIST_TYPE2
columns.description: This field indicates the type of the qualifier for target attribute value. The values can be G/D/P/F. G in case the attribute is a simple attribute. D is used for drop list. P is used for picklist.F is used for Fixed List.

columns.name: TARGET_QUERY_CLASS2
columns.description: This filed indicates the query class name of the target qualifier. This is required in case the value of the field target_list_type is G or P

columns.name: SOURCE1_TRANSLATION_KEY
columns.description: To store transaltion key for source1

columns.name: SOURCE2_TRANSLATION_KEY
columns.description: To store transaltion key for source2

columns.name: TARGET1_TRANSLATION_KEY
columns.description: To store transaltion key for target1

columns.name: TARGET2_TRANSLATION_KEY
columns.description: To store transaltion key for target2

columns.name: ASSOCIATION_TYPE
columns.description: Identifies the objects between which the data configuration is applied. Takes the values SH-TT, OR-TT, OB-TT, TT-DE.

columns.name: IS_SOURCE1_MANDATORY
columns.description: Takes the values Y/N. Determines if the source 1 requires input mandatorily or optional.

columns.name: IS_SOURCE2_MANDATORY
columns.description: Takes the values Y/N. Determines if the source 2 requires input mandatorily or optional.

columns.name: IS_TARGET1_MANDATORY
columns.description: Takes the values Y/N. Determines if the target 1 requires input mandatorily or optional.

columns.name: IS_TARGET2_MANDATORY
columns.description: Takes the values Y/N. Determines if the target 2 requires input mandatorily or optional.

columns.name: SOURCE_FIXED_VALUES1
columns.description: Takes the list of fixed values if the SOURCE_LIST_TYPE1 is F.

columns.name: SOURCE_FIXED_VALUES2
columns.description: Takes the list of fixed values if the SOURCE_LIST_TYPE2 is F.

columns.name: TARGET_FIXED_VALUES1
columns.description: Takes the list of fixed values if the TARGET_LIST_TYPE1 is F.

columns.name: TARGET_FIXED_VALUES2
columns.description: Takes the list of fixed values if the TARGET_LIST_TYPE2 is F.
